body.name: Beyond Laundry Detergent Strips [32 strips] - Fresh Linen - Eco-friendly, Hypoallergenic. Travel friendly. Dissolvable Strips.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 44 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: EASY TO USE: Easy dose sheets eliminate laundry room messes. They work well in all washing machines, including HE, hot or cold water. Add required strip(s) to the washer before adding clothes (1 strip for small-medium loads, 2 strips for medium-large loads). Place clothes in washer. Start your preferred wash cycle. They’re great for traveling, apartment living, dorm rooms, hand washing, or everyday laundry doing
ECO-FRIENDLY: USDA Certified Biobased Content. No water means less energy used in transportation. Septic safe
SAFE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Hypoallergenic and made with your sensitive skin in mind! They are free from chlorine bleach, added dyes and contain no optical brighteners

Available in Fresh Linen & Fragrance Free. Click on the Beyond store link above to learn about our eco-friendly Dishwasher Tablets and Dryer Sheets! We update our package from time to time, so there may be a difference from what you receive and the images you see here. Not to worry, it’s the same great product inside

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable, effective, and hardly any waste!
reviews.reviewText: These detergent sheets have quickly become the only ones used in our house. We're a family of 5 with 3 kids who are constantly making a mess of their clothes plus two active parents with a lot of sweaty gym clothes and I have only great things to say about these. They're so effective!! Takes out stains and odors. We've tried both scent free and the scented option and we like both. I'm super sensitive to detergent smells and love how gobeyond has very mild scent- but the overpowering ones of most big name brands. Also love how portable they are! We take them on vacation to be able to wash clothing as we go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. I have used other brand washer sheets, but this one cleans really well and the scent and detergent does not irritate my husband's sensitive skin.So easy to use, and most importantly, packaging is recyclable, so it's great for the environment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like the size and love less waste
reviews.reviewText: I'm still debating on whether or not I will stick with these or not and here's why. I absolutely love the concept of this. It's incredible the amount of waste when buying the big liquid tubs of laundry detergent. So that is incredibly appealing to me. I've found that they are cleaning the clothes and come out smelling clean but not that "Awww clean" smell. I hope some of you all will get what I mean by that. I'm happy overall with the product and it is doing what it said it would do. I think I may be used to the scents in the other and it may just take getting a scented sheet or actually getting used to the fact my clothes don't have a smell after washing. I'd recommend folks try these out as they are doing the job and cutting down on my recycling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: The laundry sheets are great, easy to use and clean the clothes well. This is the second order for me they lasted about 18 months which is about 5$ week for myself and my husband, plus lots of company. They are really nice to add to a travel bag taking no space. They take little space to store and are so much cleaner then the liquid or powder. The hardest part is teaching guests that just one strip 2x5 inch is enough for a large load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for backpacking!
reviews.reviewText: We backpacked through Europe. We brought these so we could stop and wash our clothes. Worked perfectly! Great smell. Cleaned well. My husband has sensitive skin so we were worried about him having a reaction. But no! They are good for sensitive skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hate the smell
reviews.reviewText: Its not strong but it is not a clean smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works very well. Light smell, stain fighting. Love it, won’t go back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the laundry sheets for the last 6 months and I love them. Easy to use, gets the clothes clean, small and no mess. I love that I can take them with me when I travel.These are fabulous!!
